creator: Crossroads Church (Pittsburgh)
descriptionHtml:
Crossroads is one church in multiple locations throughout the greater Pittsburgh area (Boyce Road, Cranberry, East Liberty, North Fayette, and Weirton, WV). No matter where you are on your spiritual journey, it would be an honor to help you take your next step. We would love to help you discover the life God has for you and help you grow in your faith.

This app features content from all of our locations, including messages, upcoming news & events, event registrations, and online giving.

For more information about Crossroads Church, please visit: www.crossroadsumc.org

The Crossroads Church App was created with the Subsplash App Platform.
descriptionShort: The official app from Crossroads Church in the greater Pittsburgh area.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
This release includes bug fixes and performance improvements.

We fixed an issue with the media detail page and an issue with Subsplash Live playback.

title: Crossroads Church (XR.Church)

creator: Crossroads Church (Pittsburgh)
descriptionHtml:

The Crossroads Church App was created with the Subsplash App Platform.
descriptionShort: The official app from Crossroads Church in the greater Pittsburgh area.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New in Messaging (if enabled):
- You can send files to one another
- You can mention someone using an @ symbol to notify them directly.
- Channel managers can restrict channel invites to managers
- Managers can also set artwork and descriptions for a group channel
- Administers can set channels to be public for anyone to join

Fixed:
- Media playback now stops when you force close the app
- Fixed a Messaging issue causing link previews to cause the channel to crash

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: If enabled, the app will show the viewer a prompt to take an action at a designated time during a live stream.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- If enabled, Messaging now includes threaded conversations and sharing Bible passages! Also, you can now easily see which messages have not been read since you last opened a conversation.
- The Account screen has been updated with several improvements.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

title: Crossroads Church (XR.Church)

creator: Crossroads Church (Pittsburgh)
descriptionHtml:
God is FOR you!

Crossroads is one church in multiple locations throughout the greater Pittsburgh area (Pittsburgh City, Pittsburgh North, Pittsburgh South, Pittsburgh West, Ohio Valley). No matter where you are on your spiritual journey, it would be an honor to help you take your next step. We would love to help you discover the life God has for you and help you grow in your faith.

This app features content from all of our locations, including messages, upcoming news & events, event registrations, and online giving.

• Pittsburgh South (formerly called Boyce Road / Bridgeville)
• Pittsburgh West (formerly called North Fayette / Oakdale)
• Ohio Valley (formerly called Weirton)

For more information about Crossroads Church, please visit: www.xr.church
descriptionShort: The official app from Crossroads Church in the greater Pittsburgh area.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- If enabled, audio for the Bible reading plan has been improved.
- If enabled, Messaging channels now include a "Threads" tab to show all active discussions, and the user interface has been refreshed.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

descriptionShort: The official app from Crossroads Church in the greater Pittsburgh area.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We've consolidated Listen and Watch into a single Play button on the media player. Users can still switch between listening and watching modes.
- If enabled, Messaging now features an option to silence all notifications for a predetermined period of time.
- You can now start Picture-in-picture playback in the player to watch video and browse the app at the same time.
- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- New Media Search Experience with support for Speakers, Topics, and Scripture tags
- New Related media section on Media Items shows other media tagged with the same Topics

- Misc. bug fixes and improvements.
